# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found, only individual entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them
### Errors when using entities that are not connected
-  Ensure that entities are properly connected before using them
### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before using them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables found in the execution logs.
